Uses of Package
org.pepstock.charba.client.gradient

  • Packages that use org.pepstock.charba.client.gradient 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.gradient
    Contains all classes to activate the GradientPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-gradient.js ) for CHART.js.
  • Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.gradient used by org.pepstock.charba.client.gradient 
    Class Description
    Colors
    Is a map to apply the color stop of the gradient in relation with the data of the chart.
    GradientOptions
    This is the GradientPlugin.ID plugin options where to set all configuration items needed to the plugin.
    GradientOptionsFactory
    Factory to get the options (from dataset) related to GradientPlugin.ID plugin.
    PropertyOptions
    Maps all the options which can be set for each configurable property (for instance backgroundColor, borderColor and so on).
